ie.ucd.clops.runtime.options
Interface Option<T>

All Superinterfaces:
IMatchable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicOption, BooleanOption, CLOPSErrorOption, CountedBooleanOption, EnumListOption, EnumOption, FileListOption, FileOption, FloatOption, IntegerOption, ListOption, OneArgumentOption, RegularExpressionStringOption, StringListOption, StringOption
public interface Option<T>
extends IMatchable

This interface describes information about the option needed during option parsing.

Author:
Mikolas Janota, Fintan

                       throws InvalidOptionValueException

setProperty

void setProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
                 java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws InvalidOptionPropertyValueException
Sets the value of a property. If !acceptsProperty(propertyName) then InvalidOptionPropertyValueException is thrown. InvalidOptionPropertyValueException is also thrown when the value does not match the property type.

Throws:
InvalidOptionPropertyValueException
